channel.title: Posts on Optimal Digression
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Optimal Digression

item.title: Define your motivation, do your research (& eat your vegetables)
item.description: TL;DR: Domain knowledge is more important than any code you will write. So become fluent(ish) in the problem space by researching it before you waste your time programing.

item.title: Build a data product that matters.
item.description: TL;DR: To become maximally effective, all data scientists should know the flow of producing & maintaining a data product to better understand how to fit their piece into the puzzle.
